title: How do i get PROJECT: Yasuo loading screen border?
body:
Since i havent understood the project crafting event completely, can someone explain how i can get the PROJECT: Yasuo loading screen border? What do i have to do?

Good afternoon.

replies.body: hello to all any idea if riot gonna release an event or somthin this season so we can get project border i need for my project ekko skin a border i have on zed yasuo thx for answer me if y know

Since Yasuo was the only OG PROJECT skin that was released without a border, we decided to automatically unlock his First Strike border for anyone who owns him before the PROJECT:Disruption event ends. This includes players who bought him before the event even started. For complete details, check out our [PROJECT:Disruption FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ)

Let me know if you have any questions.
Does First Strike border show only while I'm using the Project skin, or does it show no matter which champion and skin I'm playing with?
The first strike border only shows for the specific champion/PROJECT skin you have the border for, this does not work on other skins or champions.
Thanks for the info, this really helped.
can I get the border now? (10/23/2016)
No, it's too late to get the PROJECT: Yasuo border.

or can you just buy the project icon?
 (orange one)
